RomÃ¢nia din Senatul RomÃ¢niei Senator Dumitru Manea, Partidul S.O.S. RomÃ¢nia  BucureÅŸti 26.02.2025  ANEXÄ‚: SRES 148 IS 102d CONGRESS 1st Session S. RES. 148  To express the sense of the Senate that the United States should support the right to self-determination of the people of the Republic of Moldavia and northern Bucovina. IN THE SENATE OF THE UNITED STATES June 28 (legislative day, JUNE 11), 1991 Mr. PRESSLER (for himself and Mr. HELMS) submitted the following resolution; which was referred to the Committee on Foreign Relations RESOLUTION To express the sense of the Senate that the United States should support the right to self-determination of the people of the Republic of Moldavia and northern Bucovina. Whereas, the Romanian principality of Moldavia emerged as an independent state in the 14th century; Whereas, Moldavia was invaded in 1806 by the Russian Army and annexed by the Russian Empire in 1812 as a result of the Russo-Turkish Treaty of Bucharest; Whereas, on November 15, 1917, the Soviet Government proclaimed the right of the peoples of the Russian Empire to self-determination and the establishment of separate states; Whereas, on December 2, 1917, the democratically-elected Moldavian constituent assembly, the Sfatul Tsarii, proclaimed Moldavia an independent republic; Whereas, on April 9, 1918, the Constituent Assembly voted to unite Moldavia with the Kingdom of Romania; Whereas, the United States, France, Italy, Great Britain, Japan and the other allied states specifically sanctioned and recognized the reunion of Moldavia with Romania in the Peace Treaty of Paris of October 28, 1920; Whereas, the Soviet Union's armed forces invaded the Kingdom of Romania on June 28, 1940 and occupied eastern Moldavia and northern Bucovina, andHertsa in contravention of the Charter of the League of Nations; the Treaty of Paris of 1920; the General Treaty for the Renunciation of War of 1928; the Romanian-Union of Soviet Socialist Republics Mutual Assistance Pact of1936; the Conventions for the Definition of Aggression of 1933; and generally recognized principles of international law; Whereas, the annexation of Moldavia, northern Bucovina, and Hertsa was prospectively agreed to in certain secret protocols to a treaty of nonaggression concluded between the Government of the Soviet Union and the German Reich on August 23, 1939; Whereas, from 1940 to 1953 hundreds of thousands of Romanians from Moldavia and Bucovina were deported by the Union of Soviet Socialist Republics to Central Asia and Siberia; Whereas, the United States Government has repeatedly stated its refusal to recognize forcible seizure of territory pursuant to the terms of the so-called Stalin-Hitler Pact, including the 1940 Soviet annexation of Estonia, Latvia, and Lithuania; Whereas, the Governments of the United Kingdom, the Soviet Union and the United States are parties to the Atlantic Charter of August 14, 1941, in which the signatories declared their `desire to see no territorial changes that do not accord with the freely expressed will of the peoples concerned' and affirmed their wish `to see sovereign rights and self-government restored to those who have been forcibly deprived of them' during the course of the Second World War; Whereas, on August 31, 1989, the Supreme Council of Moldavia declared Romanian to be the official language of the Republic and reestablished the Latin alphabet forbidden by the Soviet Government during the occupation of Moldavia as the alphabet of written Romanian; Whereas, in March, 1990, the Romanian people of Moldavia were able to vote in free and fair elections for deputies to the Supreme Council of Moldavia; Whereas, on April 27, 1990, the Supreme Council of Moldavia restored the flag of Romania as the official flag of the republic; Whereas, on June 23, 1990, the Supreme Council of Moldavia declared the Republic of Moldavia a sovereign state; Whereas, on December 16, 1990, more than eight hundred thousand Romanians gathered at the Second Grand National Assembly in the Moldavian capital of Chisinau to declare the national independence of Romanians in occupied territories; Whereas, the people of Moldavia refused to participate in the Soviet referendum of March 3, 1991 despite Soviet governmental efforts to threaten and intimidate the Moldavian people into accepting a new union treaty; Whereas, the signatory states of the Helsinki Final Act have accepted the principle of the equal rights of people and their right to self-determination;and Whereas, pursuant to article 8 of the Helsinki Final Act `all peoples always have the right, in full freedom, to determine, when and if they wish, their internal and external political status, without external interference, and to pursue as they wish their political, economic, social, and cultural development': Now, Therefore, be it   Resolved, That it is the sense of the Senate that the United States Government should--   (1) Support the right of self-determination of the people of Soviet-occupied Moldavia and northern Bucovina and issue a statement to that effect; and      (2) Support future efforts by the Government of Moldavia to negotiate peacefully,  if they so wish, the reunification of Romania with Moldavia and Northern Bucovina  as established in the Paris Peace Treaty of 1920, the prevailing norms of international law,  and in conformity with Principle 1 of the Helsinki Final Act.

DupÄƒ care dÄƒdea startul: dacÄƒ vizirul demis ajungea Ã®n capÄƒtul grÄƒdinii fÄƒrÄƒ sÄƒ-l prindÄƒ din urmÄƒ grÄƒdinarul, scÄƒpa cu viaÈ›Äƒ. Azi s-a renunÈ›at la laÈ›ul de mÄƒtase, dar efectul e acelaÈ™i: cum apare â€un nou È™erif Ã®n oraÈ™â€, e posibil ca parteneriatele anterioare sÄƒ cadÄƒ. Iar domnitorii noÈ™tri, dibaci fanarioÈ›i, cunoscÄƒtori ai nÄƒravurilor de la Ãnalta PoartÄƒ, trimiteau soli cu peÈ™cheÈ™uri bogate, pentru a-i reaminti noului vizir de vechile Ã®nÈ›elegeri. SÄƒ nu le trimitÄƒ la arhivÄƒ, sÄƒ nu le dea foc. SÄƒ nu treacÄƒ politica externÄƒ pe persoanÄƒ fizicÄƒ. SÄƒ nu reseteze Parteneriatul Strategic cu ÈšÄƒrile RomÃ¢ne, fiindcÄƒ interesele politice, comerciale È™i militare reciproce sunt prea mari ca LuminÄƒÈ›ia Sa sÄƒ le joace la â€faraonâ€ ori la â€stosâ€ cu muscalii...  Nu È™tiu Ã®n ce formÄƒ fizicÄƒ este fostul vizir Blinken È™i nu È™tiu dacÄƒ grÄƒdinarul Casei Albe are, pe fiÈ™a postului, È™i sarcina de a-l alerga pÃ¢nÄƒ Ã®n capÄƒtul grÄƒdinii. Dar vÄƒd cÄƒ alte obiceiuri fanariote sunt Ã®n vigoare. Poate cÄƒ ar fi fost sÄƒnÄƒtos ca, precum domnitorii noÈ™tri greci, din vechime, sÄƒ trimitem la Ãnalta PoartÄƒ soli cu peÈ™cheÈ™uri pentru noul vizir, pentru a-i reaminti de vechile Ã®nÈ›elegeri, ca sÄƒ nu le trimitÄƒ la ArhivÄƒ, sÄƒ nu anuleze Parteneriatul Strategic â€dubiosâ€, spre bucuria muscalilor. title: INTERVIU Marius Oprea, istoric: â€Vechii securisti au decis sa preia ei insisi, in mod direct, puterea
article: Este un bou cine mai crede azi ca lupta politica se da intre social-democratii PSD, liberali PNL, centru USR, extrema stanga care nu exista si extrema dreapta AUR/POT/SOS. Lupta este intre clanuri securiste inca din 17 decembrie 1989. Doar ca azi in locul greilor d-atunci au venit pensionarii speciali, d-aia nu se atinge nimeni de ei. Ei conduc Romania, de facto! Ei dicteaza si  aproba listele, sau le taie ori anuleaza, cand trec pe sub radar.  Ei mentin, exact ca Putin, necesitatea celor 200.000 de semnÄƒturi pentru candidati.  De exemplu, la USR unde am contracandidat-o pe Elena Lasconi pentru desemnarea candidatului USR la prezidentiale, alegerile au fost facute nu de membri simpli ci de "delegati" care aveau o singura misiune, s-o voteze pe Elena. Au fost instruiti sa nu greseasca.  De ce Elena Lasconi? Pentru ca aveau nevoie de un candidat care sa fie pe placul lor, sa-l inteleaga si sa nu deranjeze. Cineva care n are nicio treaba cu functia de presedinte de partid sau de rara.  Elena se aseamana foarte mult cu Calin Georgescu. Este o carte deschisa fara colturi indoite datatoare de surprize electorale. Fara idei proprii, fara sa fie strateg sau sa produca schimbare in jur.   Dar ca ce sa vezi, Elena a intrat in finala, pe neasteptate!  Unde a inceput povestea? De la intrarea in NATO au fost trimisi in" pensie"  zeci de mii de sefi ai armatei, politiei si serviciilor. Cei mai multi, cu acces la informatii secrete, au fost pusi in functii de conducere in ministere, deconcentrate si companii cu impact, pentru protectie si tacere. O parte,  formata dintre cei care  au fost mai destepti, au preluat afaceri care furnizeaza bani negri pentru misiuni ale serviciilor. Intre timp, puterea acestor securisti care fac afaceri in numele serviciilor a ajuns atat de mare prin aport financiar in conturile politicienilor, incat ei decid azi politica in Romania. Misiunile oentru Romania au devenit exceptii, acapararea puterii, a banilor si a contractelor au devenit activitatile de baza. Serviciile, slabite prin numiri politice execrabile, au devenit dependente de niste mici dictatori nascuti chiar dintre randurile pensionarilor speciali. Acesti oameni decid cine sunt primul ministru, candidatii, investitiile si cursul Romaniei.   Cei care incearca sa faca ceva bun in interiorul Armatei, Politiei sau Serviciilor sunt marginalizati sau evacuati, ca niste oi negre.   Din pacate nu-s niste scoliti in politica internationala si nici mari oameni de afaceri care sa produca bani in competitia unei piete libere.   Securistii si militarizatii speciali unt devoratori intr-un sistem infractional national, in care romanii sunt sclavi pe plantatie.  Copii lor sunt oamenii "noi" din politica, singurii in care sistemul are incredere ca nu-,i vor aresta sau scoate din joc. De aceea poti ajunge prim-ministru fara BAC sau competitiri pentru Cotroceni cu facultati facute la misto.  Stiti gruparea Guvernul Nastase/Ponta/Ghita-Ilie Sarbu-Hrebe?  Toti sunt inca mufati de catre serviciile romane la banii din taxele platite de romani sau de companiile private.  Dupa incendiul de la Colectiv, Guvernu Ponta a trebuit sa fie "albit" un pic, 6 luni. Asa a aparut Guvernul Ciolos, cu Dacian Ciolos pus sa dea bine si in randurile 2/3/4 copiii securistilor care prezentau garantii de seriozitate pe ciordeala. Da, ii vedeti in fiecare seara la TV.  A fost momentul in care Loja securistior de pretutindeni, aia pentru care Nastase a prestat gestul sinuciderii, a simptit ca cel mai sanatos este sa-ti construiesti propria opozitie. Iar momentul in care Nicusor Dan a rupt cu USB, in 2016, pe neasteptate pentru securisti, a aratat ca cea mai buna Opozitie e cea controlata sau constrita sau preluata ostil precum USR. Fix asa a fos ND scos din joc si inlocuit de copiii cu sange albastru, de uniforma. Nu presupun, am trait asta niste ani de zile in care am facut opozitie in interiorul USR. Am dat nas in nas cu baietii vechi si noi, "destepti", care  fac politica sau au functii in stat primite cu obligatia sa aiba un master/doctorat  la servicii si un angajament de colaborare. Asa au fost infiintate/preluate filialele vechilor partide, inclusiv ale USB devenit USR si transformate pe repede inainte in filiale POT/SOS/AUR, cu aport masiv  din interiorul filialelor existente.  Asa ca atentie mare,  "ciupercile" crescute peste noapte pe buturuga politica putrezita sunt otravitoare! Romania e singura tara europeana inca condusa relicva politica comunistoida.  Oricat ai trage la jug, ca salariat sau antreprenor, baietii au un singur scop, sa te scuture de venituri, lunar si sa transfere banii tai catre contractele lor cu statul, fie ele colective de munca , pensii speciale sau afaceri cu statul.   Vechii securisti grupati in asociatiile de rezervisti ale fostilor angajati in serviciile de informatii, impreuna cu rezervistii din randurile cadrelor MApN, s-au organizat in structuri de propaganda aproape paramilitare care-l sustin pe Calin Georgescu, afirma istoricul Marius Oprea intr-un intervi...
